prevent_read_receipts.name: Prevent Read Receipts
prevent_read_receipts.description: Prevent anyone from knowing you've opened their Snaps

hide_bitmoji_presence.name: Hide Bitmoji Presence
hide_bitmoji_presence.description: Hides your Bitmoji presence from the chat

unlimited_snap_view_time.name: Unlimited Snap View Time
unlimited_snap_view_time.description: Removes the time limit for viewing Snaps

prevent_screenshot_notifications.name: Prevent Screenshot Notifications
prevent_screenshot_notifications.description: Prevents anyone from knowing that you've taken a screenshot

prevent_status_notifications.name: Prevent Status Notifications
prevent_status_notifications.description:
Prevents sending status notifications
e.g. Saved to camera roll

anonymous_story_view.name: Anonymous Story View
anonymous_story_view.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've seen their story

save_folder.name: Save Folder
save_folder.description: The directory where all media is saved

auto_download_options.name: Auto Download Options
auto_download_options.description: Select which medias to auto download

chat_download_context_menu.name: Chat Download Context Menu
chat_download_context_menu.description: Enable the chat download context menu

gallery_media_send_override.name: Gallery Media Send Override
gallery_media_send_override.description: Overrides media sent from the gallery

auto_save_messages.name: Auto Save Messages
auto_save_messages.description: Select which type of messages to auto save

enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.name: Friend Feed Menu Bar
enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.description: Enables the new Friend Feed Menu Bar

friend_feed_menu_buttons.name: Friend Feed Menu Buttons
friend_feed_menu_buttons.description: Select which buttons to show in the Friend Feed Menu Bar

friend_feed_menu_buttons_position.name: Friend Feed Buttons Position Index
friend_feed_menu_buttons_position.description: The position of the Friend Feed Menu Buttons

hide_ui_elements.name: Hide UI Elements
hide_ui_elements.description: Select which UI elements to hide

hide_story_section.name: Hide Story Section
hide_story_section.description: Hide certain UI Elements shown in the story section

story_viewer_override.name: Story Viewer Override
story_viewer_override.description: Turns on certain features which Snapchat hid

streak_expiration_info.name: Show Streak Expiration Info
streak_expiration_info.description: Shows Streak expiration info next to streaks

disable_snap_splitting.name: Disable Snap Splitting
disable_snap_splitting.description: Prevents Snaps from being split into multiple parts

location_spoof.name: Snapmap Location Spoofer
location_spoof.description: Spoofs your location on the Snapmap

message_preview_length.name: Message Preview Length
message_preview_length.description: Specify the amount of messages to be previewed

unlimited_conversation_pinning.name: Unlimited Conversation Pinning
unlimited_conversation_pinning.description: Enables the ability to pin unlimited conversations

enable_app_appearance.name: Enable App Appearance Settings
enable_app_appearance.description: Enables the hidden app appearance settings

auto_updater.name: Auto Updater
auto_updater.description: The interval of checking for updates

disable_camera.name: Disable Camera
disable_camera.description: Prevents Snapchat from being able to use the camera

immersive_camera_preview.name: Immersive Camera Preview
immersive_camera_preview.description: Stops Snapchat from cropping the camera preview

force_highest_frame_rate.name: Force Highest Frame Rate
force_highest_frame_rate.description: Forces the highest possible frame rate

app_passcode.name: Set App Passcode
app_passcode.description: Sets a passcode to lock the app

app_lock_on_resume.name: App Lock On Resume
app_lock_on_resume.description: Locks the app when it's reopened

meo_passcode_bypass.name: My Eyes Only Passcode Bypass
meo_passcode_bypass.description:
Bypass the My Eyes Only passcode
This will only work if the passcode has been entered correctly before

amoled_dark_mode.name: AMOLED Dark Mode
amoled_dark_mode.description:
Enables AMOLED dark mode
Make sure Snapchat's dark mode is enabled

unlimited_multi_snap.name: Unlimited Multi Snap
unlimited_multi_snap.description: Allows you to take an unlimited amount of multi snaps

download_options.append_hash: Add a unique hash to the file name
download_options.append_username: Add the username to the file name
download_options.append_date_time: Add the date and time to the file name
download_options.append_type: Add the media type to the file name

auto_updater.dialog_message:
There is a new Update for SnapEnhance available! ({version})

{body}

chat_export.finished: Done! You now can close this dialog.

download_manager_activity.remove_all_text: Are you sure you want to do this?

debug_settings_page.clear_file_confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear the {file_name} file?
debug_settings_page.reset_all_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
